title: LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image HELP
body: So this problem started yesterday for me and I have no idea how to solve it, I've deleted and reinstalled it 3 times every time as administrator and it would work....... only for the first launch. When I would be done playing I would get off and if I tried to launch league after the first time the same message would pop up "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcrypto-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software support vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020." Help please

replies.body:
Sometimes that can happen if the files weren't properly installed or otherwise ended up corrupted or missing. Normally I can fix this up pretty quickly and easily by following the steps in the image below, but don't hesitate to hit me back up if this doesn't help.

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
Thank you, so far this is working. I'll get back to you if it stops working all of a sudden.

This is the work around I have been using for about 2 weeks.  Now when I go to log in by launching lol.launcher.admin.exe I still get the LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image error.  Again, this had been working just fine up until today.  Any suggestions?
